net.gree.asdk.api
Interface Achievement.AchievementListUpdateListener

Enclosing class:
Achievement
public static interface Achievement.AchievementListUpdateListener

This is the listener to receive the list of achievements.

Method Summary
 void onFailure(int responseCode, HeaderIterator headers, java.lang.String response)
          Something went wrong when trying to create load the achievements.
 void onSuccess(int index, int totalListSize, Achievement[] requestedElements)
          This method will is called in response to the Achievement.loadAchievements(int count, int startIndex, AchievementListUpdateListener listener) method.
 

Method Detail

onSuccess

void onSuccess(int index,
               int totalListSize,
               Achievement[] requestedElements)
This method will is called in response to the Achievement.loadAchievements(int count, int startIndex, AchievementListUpdateListener listener) method.

Parameters:
index - : This is the index from which the requested elements have been loaded. -1 if unknown
totalListSize - : This is the total number of elements in the blocked user list. -1 if unknown
requestedElements - : The achievements. This might be empty if this game does not have any achievements.

onFailure

void onFailure(int responseCode,
               HeaderIterator headers,
               java.lang.String response)
Something went wrong when trying to create load the achievements.

Parameters:
responseCode - the code of the http response
headers - the headers of the http response
response - the body of the http response
